titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of Harold Washington, the 42d mayor of Chicago.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/18/2001--Introduced. Calls for the Citizens Stamp Advisory Committee of the U.S. Postal Service to recommend, and the Postmaster General to issue, a postage stamp honoring Harold Washington, the first African-American elected mayor of Chicago.
